sentences.en: An earthworm is a terricolous organism.
But when genetic characterization of the contents of beetle guts gave some unexpected results, the researchers decided to take a closer look at earthworm DNA.
sentences.cn: 但是，当甲虫背脊骨包容的遗传特性显示出一些意想不到的结果时，这些研究人员决定仔细查明蚯蚓的DNA。

sentences.en: Earthworm channels greatly aid root growth.
sentences.cn: 蚯蚓洞穴极有助于植物根系生长.

sentences.en: Germination is complicated with the bursting forth of a meteor and with the peck of a swallow cracking its egg, and it places on one level the birth of an earthworm and the advent of Socrates.
sentences.cn: 万物的化育是复杂的，有风云雷电诸天象，有破壳而出的乳燕，一条蚯蚓的出生和苏格拉底的来临同属于化育之列。

sentences.en: In the earthworm and many other invertebrates, these excretory structures are called nephridia.
sentences.cn: 在蚯蚓和许多其它无脊椎动物中, 这些排泄结构称为肾管.

sentences.en: Life can be exciting and extreme, even an " earthworm. "
sentences.cn: 即使是一只 [ 海蚯蚓 ],生命也可以是精采而不寻常.

sentences.en: Study the making technique of compound earthworm capsule extract powder.
sentences.cn: 目的:研究复方地龙胶囊浸膏粉制备工艺.

sentences.en: That chick pecks out an earthworm from the earth.
sentences.cn: 那只小鸡从土里啄出一条蚯蚓.

sentences.en: The earthworm can regenerate if it's cut in half.
sentences.cn: 蚯蚓被切成两段后可以重新生长.

sentences.en: The earthworm is a useful animal. On the ground it is food for other animals. Under the ground, it makes rich soil for fields and gardens.
sentences.cn: 蚯蚓是一种有益的动物。在地面上它是其他动物的食物。在地下，它为田园和花园制造肥沃的土壤。

sentences.en: The earthworm population had declined by 70 %.
The finless eel ate the earthworm in front in one bite.
sentences.cn: 黄鳝一口就把眼前的蛐蟮吃掉了.

sentences.en: The hen raked up an earthworm.
The oral opening in an earthworm is small.
The research made a use of the earthworm with a competition of natural fertilizer to study the influence of the two treatments to the ammonia yield in livestock excrement.
sentences.cn: 该试验利用蚯蚓生物处理方法，同自然堆肥作对比试验，研究了两种处理对畜禽粪便氨气产量的影响。

sentences.en: The tortoise does not know an earthworm, also ignore.
sentences.cn: 乌龟不认识蚯蚓, 也不理睬.

sentences.en: Their extraordinary image sandy soil plain earthworm lizard and javelin lizard.
sentences.cn: 它们非常像沙土平原的蚯蚓蜥蜴和标枪蜥蜴.

sentences.en: We also went fishing with an earthworm on the hook.
sentences.cn: 我们经常把蚯蚓穿在钩子上面去钓鱼.

trans.tran_en: a common type of long thin brown worm that lives in soil
